Reviews.Title: Average Performance
Reviews.Author: Fotis
Reviews.Content: Bought it 5 days ago.Good: Quality is very good, screen, price (280 euro) and soundBAD: Everything else, from battery life, to wifi functionality, from processor to ram speed etc.No more than 3 stars, could be just two

Reviews.Title: just perfect
Reviews.Author: T. Nakad
Reviews.Content: i bought this mobile not from amazon. this was the best phone ever. (i was using previously Galaxy note)i'm using it over 4 months now. battery is just perfect, very fast.very slim (the slimest phone)the PLUS:- the front camera of 5MP!! it's just amazing for self shooting (use HDR settings)- the design is so sexy; the ful screen capability (u can hide the bar) so you get a small dimensions phone with 4.7" screen- very strong processor (huawei are the leaders) never freezes.- 2GB ROM - 16GB RAM just perfect- battery last for the day. with all the calls and internet stuff i do. (it has a feature of smart power plan very useful to save battery life)- u can wear gloves and use the phone!! it is just perfect in cold weather. none of any other mobiles have that feature i guess.the NEGATIVE:- don't save any number with the country code; otherwise it won't recognize the calling name.
